title: Health Library
description: The articles in the Zakim Center's Integrative Therapies Education Series are designed to help patients and families cope with the challenges of cancer treatment. The articles explain the various integrative therapies offered at the Zakim Center - and how these therapies help cancer patients during and after treatment.
cleaned_text: Visiting Dana-Farber? See our prescreening and mask requirements. Please note that some translations using Google Translate may not be accurately represented and downloaded documents cannot be translated. Dana-Farber assumes no liability for inaccuracies that may result from using this third-party tool, which is for website translation and not clinical interactions. You may request a live medical interpreter for a discussion about your care. Read these informative articles in our Integrative Therapies Education Series. Produced by Dana-Farber's Leonard P. Zakim Center for Integrative Therapies and Healthy Living, these articles are part of our commitment to helping patients and families cope with the challenges of cancer treatment. They explain the various integrative therapies offered at the Zakim Center - and how these therapies help cancer patients during and after treatment. Learn about the benefits of: New Patient
